attributes.action: forces homes for families or single soldiers leaving the armed forces
attributes.additional_details:
I ask the priminster to please help build new homes for families leaving the armed forces or single soldiers who end up homeless after their service whether it is full or short time served.

If suitable tower blocks were built in this garrsion of Aldershot or any other garrison families and single soldiers could move out stress free and hand the property back on time when other families need this accommodation who are serving and without threatening letters to court and locks changed.  I have not asked for houses I have asked to please help with something.
